name: Wild Rice Buttermilk Pancakes
keywords: buttermilk, flour, wild rice, side dish, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the eggs, buttermilk and baking soda together in a large bowl. Combine the flour, baking powder, sugar and salt; add to the egg mixture. Stir in the melted butter and wild rice.

Heat the griddle or skillet until hot. Lightly film with grease. Pour on the batter to make four-inch rounds and cook until dry around the edges. Turn and cook on the other side until lightly browned. Serve with butter and warm berry compote, if desired.
